body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Alexander Green and I'm calling from Laser Tag FunZone. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Lisa. How may I assist you today? Could you please provide me with the first three numbers of your membership ID?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also confirm your date of birth for verification purposes, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's the seventh of March, ninety-eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Lisa. Do you have any questions or concerns you'd like to discuss about our Laser Tag Arena today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I was wondering about your operating hours and if you have any upcoming promotions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We are open from ten a.m. to nine p.m. daily, and we have a special promotion next month for group bookings. Is there anything else you would like to know, Lisa?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Lisa. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!
